attributes.additional_details: Make it so all fire works are Silent to support a vast majority of people. To keep our animals safe from stress and death.
attributes.background: I believe a long with many other that all fireworks should be silent. Not only for our animals but for our elderly who may suffer with dementia and for our war veterans who think we’re in another world war. Also for people with ptsd who struggle with the loud bangs for many reasons.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
